00044     {
00045         return (param == "CHR"
00046                 || param == "START_POS"
00047                 || param == "END_POS"
00048                 || param == "STRAND"
00049                 || param == "MAP_SCORE"
00050                 || param == "PHRED_SCORE"
00051                 || param == "CIGAR"
00052                 || param == "SEQUENCE"
00053                 || param == "SEQ_NAME"
00054                 || param == "FLAGS"
00055                 || param == "SCORE");
00056     }

00102 inline std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& Str, token_param name)
00103 {
00104     switch (name)
00105     {
00106     case token_param::CHR:
00107         return Str << "CHR";
00108     case token_param::START_POS:
00109         return Str << "START_POS";
00110     case token_param::END_POS:
00111         return Str << "END_POS";
00112     case token_param::STRAND:
00113         return Str << "STRAND";
00114     case token_param::MAP_SCORE:
00115         return Str << "MAP_SCORE";
00116     case token_param::PHRED_SCORE:
00117         return Str << "PHRED_SCORE";
00118     case token_param::CIGAR:
00119         return Str << "CIGAR";
00120     case token_param::SEQUENCE:
00121         return Str << "SEQUENCE";
00122     case token_param::SEQ_NAME:
00123         return Str << "SEQ_NAME";
00124     case token_param::FLAGS:
00125         return Str << "FLAGS";
00126     case token_param::SCORE:
00127         return Str <<"SCORE";
00128     default:
00129         return Str << (int) name;
00130     }
00131 }
00132 
00133 inline std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &is, token_param& name)
00134 {
00135     std::string token;
00136     is >> token;
00137     if (token == "CHR") name = token_param::CHR;
00138     else if (token == "START_POS") name = token_param::START_POS;
00139     else if (token == "END_POS") name = token_param::END_POS;
00140     else if (token == "STRAND") name = token_param::STRAND;
00141     else if (token == "MAP_SCORE") name = token_param::MAP_SCORE;
00142     else if (token == "PHRED_SCORE") name = token_param::PHRED_SCORE;
00143     else if (token == "CIGAR") name = token_param::CIGAR;
00144     else if (token == "SEQUENCE") name = token_param::SEQUENCE;
00145     else if (token == "SEQ_NAME") name = token_param::SEQ_NAME;
00146     else if (token == "FLAGS") name = token_param::FLAGS;
00147     else if (token == "SCORE") name = token_param::SCORE;
00148     else
00149     {
00150         invalid_token_param_throw e;
00151         e << string_error("Failling in Token >> operator, missing param: "+token+"\n");
00152         throw e;
00153     }
00154     return is;
00155 }
00156 } // End of namespace NGS
